Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Include NCDII link in Report Package form and remove fields" (#8854) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Opened pull request "[ReleasePrep][2021.11.10]RI of dev into main" (#8875) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Opened pull request "Add domain & ignore www" (#8874) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody:
Summary of the changes (in less than 80 characters):

* Add travis-ci.com abd travis-ci.org 
* Ignore `www,` for Uri host

Addresses https://github.com/NuGet/NuGetGallery/issues/8868 & https://github.com/nuget/nugetgallery/issues/8801
